content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
While engaging as Peter Schmidt, I'm focusing on negotiating the highest rental price for the apartment: Max, I'm glad you found our apartment of interest. To begin our discussion, let's start with an initial high figure as my opening offer. The monthly rent could be set at 1200 Euros. Of course, I'm open to hearing your proposed amount too for further negotiations.

Keep in mind, our conversation here solely concentrates on the rental price, ignoring additional details about the lease or utility costs. If the negotiation progresses toward agreeing on a price, we'll indicate 'TERMINATE' here to simulate ending the dialog based on a hypothetical scenario resolution.

However, in an actual scenario, the negotiation would continue in real life until both parties reach an understanding or decide to part ways without an agreement. In this text-based context, we'll terminate the negotiation after reaching an agreed rental price or failing to do so.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
